Body.Build: Glass front, glass back or eco leather back, aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Nano-SIM and eSIM or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android 10, EMUI 11, no Google Play Services
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.13 GHz Cortex-A77 & 3x2.54 GHz Cortex-A77 & 4x2.05 GHz Cortex-A55)

Memory.Card slot: NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot)

Main Camera.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, multi-directional PDAF, Laser AF
12 MP, f/3.4, 125mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
20 MP, f/1.8, 18mm (ultrawide), PDAF
Main Camera.Features: Leica optics, LED flash, panorama, HDR

Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

Features.Sensors: Face ID, fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass, color spectrum

Misc.Colors: Mystic Silver, White, Black, Green, Yellow
